name: FoundSimply
description:
FoundSimply is a comprehensive, KPI-driven provider of marketing solutions. 
FoundSimply was created with the vision of presenting a solution to the problems marketing agencies produce for their clients. 
The three pillars of the company are transparency, efficiency, and affordability. We eliminated unnecessary overhead and pass those savings along to our clients. We also built a very select team of highly-skilled subject matter experts in every marketing niche.
